description: KM: SQL Server Permissions (Users, Roles, Securables)
body:
/* General Information */
SELECT
    ServerName       = @@SERVERNAME
   ,DatabaseUserName = USER_NAME()
   ,LoginName        = SUSER_NAME()
   ,[Is sysadmin]    = IIF(IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('sysadmin') = 1, 'True', 'False');
GO

/* Use Whoami /groups from command prompt or PowerShell to find all the groups you belong to. */

/* My Assigned Roles */
SELECT
    RoleName   = R.name
   ,MemberName = M.name
FROM
    sys.database_role_members      AS DRM
INNER JOIN sys.database_principals AS R ON DRM.role_principal_id   = R.principal_id
INNER JOIN sys.database_principals AS M ON DRM.member_principal_id = M.principal_id
WHERE
    M.name = USER_NAME()
ORDER BY
    R.name
   ,M.name;
GO

/* My Granted Permissions */
SELECT
    PermissionName  = DP.permission_name
   ,PermissionState = DP.state_desc
   ,ObjectName      = O.name
   ,ObjectType      = O.type_desc
FROM
    sys.database_permissions       AS DP
LEFT JOIN sys.objects              AS O ON DP.major_id             = O.object_id
INNER JOIN sys.database_principals AS P ON DP.grantee_principal_id = P.principal_id
WHERE
    P.name = USER_NAME()
ORDER BY
    DP.permission_name
   ,DP.state_desc;
GO

/* My Server-Level Roles */
SELECT
    LoginName  = SP.name
   ,ServerRole = SLR.name
FROM
    sys.server_role_members AS SRM
JOIN sys.server_principals  AS SP ON SRM.member_principal_id = SP.principal_id
JOIN sys.server_principals  AS SLR ON SRM.role_principal_id  = SLR.principal_id
WHERE
    SP.name = SUSER_NAME()
ORDER BY
    SP.name
   ,SLR.name;
GO

/* My Schema-Level Permissions */
SELECT
    PermissionName  = DP.permission_name
   ,PermissionState = DP.state_desc
   ,SchemaName      = S.name
FROM
    sys.database_permissions AS DP
JOIN sys.schemas             AS S ON DP.major_id             = S.schema_id
JOIN sys.database_principals AS P ON DP.grantee_principal_id = P.principal_id
WHERE
    P.name = USER_NAME()
ORDER BY
    DP.permission_name
   ,DP.state_desc
   ,S.name;
GO

/* All Database Users */
SELECT
    Username = name
   ,type_desc
   ,create_date
   ,modify_date
FROM
    sys.database_principals
WHERE
    type_desc NOT IN ('DATABASE_ROLE')
AND sid IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
    Username;
GO

/* All Role Members */
SELECT
    DatabaseRoleName = R.name
   ,DatabaseUserName = ISNULL(U.name, 'No members')
FROM
    sys.database_principals         AS R
LEFT JOIN sys.database_role_members AS M ON R.principal_id        = M.role_principal_id
LEFT JOIN sys.database_principals   AS U ON M.member_principal_id = U.principal_id
WHERE
    R.type = 'R'
ORDER BY
    R.name;
GO

/* All Role Securables */
SELECT
    Securable = 'GRANT ' + DP.permission_name + ' ON ' + CASE DP.class_desc
                                                             WHEN 'SCHEMA'
                                                                 THEN SCHEMA_NAME(DP.major_id)
                                                             WHEN 'OBJECT_OR_COLUMN'
                                                                 THEN CASE WHEN DP.minor_id = 0
                                                                               THEN OBJECT_NAME(DP.major_id)COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_KS_WS
                                                                          ELSE (
                                                                          SELECT
                                                                              OBJECT_NAME(object_id) + ' (' + name + ')'
                                                                          FROM
                                                                              sys.columns
                                                                          WHERE
                                                                              object_id = DP.major_id
                                                                          AND column_id = DP.minor_id
                                                                      )
                                                                      END
                                                             ELSE 'other'
                                                         END + ' TO ' + P.name COLLATE Latin1_General_CI_AS_KS_WS
FROM
    sys.database_permissions       AS DP
INNER JOIN sys.database_principals AS P ON DP.grantee_principal_id = P.principal_id
WHERE
    DP.major_id > 0
AND DP.permission_name IN ('SELECT', 'INSERT', 'UPDATE', 'DELETE')
ORDER BY
    P.name
   ,DP.permission_name;
GO

/* All Role Permissions */
SELECT
    PrincipalName = R.name
   ,PrincipalType = R.type_desc
   ,GrantedBy     = ISNULL(G.name, 'System')
   ,P.permission_name
   ,P.state_desc
   ,ObjectName    = ISNULL(O.name, 'N/A')
   ,ObjectType    = ISNULL(O.type_desc, 'N/A')
FROM
    sys.database_permissions      AS P
LEFT JOIN sys.objects             AS O ON P.major_id             = O.object_id
LEFT JOIN sys.database_principals AS R ON P.grantee_principal_id = R.principal_id
LEFT JOIN sys.database_principals AS G ON P.grantor_principal_id = G.principal_id
WHERE
    R.type_desc = 'DATABASE_ROLE'
AND R.name NOT IN ('public')
ORDER BY
    R.name
   ,P.permission_name;
GO

/* All Logins (SQL and Windows) with Server Roles and Disabled Status */
SELECT
    LoginName   = SP.name
   ,LoginType   = SP.type_desc
   ,IsDisabled  = SP.is_disabled
   ,ServerRoles = ISNULL(STUFF((
                                   SELECT
                                       ', ' + SR.name
                                   FROM
                                       sys.server_role_members AS SRM
                                   JOIN sys.server_principals  AS SR ON SRM.role_principal_id = SR.principal_id
                                   WHERE
                                       SRM.member_principal_id = SP.principal_id
                                   FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE
                               ).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)')
                            ,1
                            ,2
                            ,''
                         )
                     ,'No Roles'
                  )
   ,SP.create_date
   ,SP.modify_date
FROM
    sys.server_principals         AS SP
LEFT JOIN sys.server_role_members AS SRM ON SP.principal_id       = SRM.member_principal_id
LEFT JOIN sys.server_principals   AS SRP ON SRM.role_principal_id = SRP.principal_id
WHERE
    SP.type_desc IN ('SQL_LOGIN', 'WINDOWS_LOGIN', 'WINDOWS_GROUP')
ORDER BY
    LoginName;
GO
